summary.span: 支持通过标记文本在 ASP.NET 网页中使用语言集成查询 (LINQ)，以从数据对象中检索和修改数据。

span.span: Enables the use of Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) in an ASP.NET Web page through markup text to retrieve and modify data from a data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [操作顺序Order of Operations](#order_of_operations) - [对数据进行排序Ordering Data](#ordering_data) - [数据分组Grouping Procedures](#working_with_stored_procedures) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 语言集成查询 (LINQ) 是用于定义一组启用以在任何声明性方式表示遍历、 筛选和投影操作的查询运算符的查询语法。基于 NET 的编程语言。Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) is a query syntax that defines a set of query operators that enable traversal, filter, and projection operations to be expressed in a declarative way in any .NET-based programming language. 数据对象可以是内存中数据集合或表示数据库中的数据的对象。The data object can be an in-memory data collection or an object that represents data from a database. 可以检索或修改数据而无需编写每个操作的 SQL 命令。You can retrieve or modify the data without having to write SQL commands for each operation. 控件可在 ASP.NET 网页中使用 LINQ，通过标记文本中设置属性。The control enables you to use LINQ in an ASP.NET Web page by setting properties in markup text. 控件使用 LINQ to SQL 来自动生成的数据命令。The control uses LINQ to SQL to automatically generate the data commands. 有关 LINQ to SQL 的详细信息，请参阅[LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). 当从内存中的数据集合检索数据时，您将设置属性设置为包含数据集合的类。When you are retrieving data from an in-memory data collection, you set the property to the class that contains the data collection. 您设置属性设置为属性或字段的返回数据集合。You set the property to the property or field that returns the data collection. 例如，可能有一个名为类`Person`，其中包含一个名为属性`FavoriteCities`返回一个字符串值数组。For example, you might have a class named `Person` that contains a property named `FavoriteCities` that returns an array of string values. 在这种情况下，设置属性设置为`Person`并设置属性设置为`FavoriteCities`。In that case, you set the property to `Person` and set the property to `FavoriteCities`. 在所查询的数据库，必须首先创建表示数据库及其中的表的实体类。When you are querying a database, you must first create entity classes that represent the database and its tables. 可以使用[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_long](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-long-md.md)]或 SqlMetal.exe 实用工具来生成这些类。You can use the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_long](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-long-md.md)] or the SqlMetal.exe utility to generate these classes. 然后设置属性设置为表示数据库的类并设置属性设置为表示数据库表的属性。You then set the property to the class that represents the database and set the property to the property that represents the database table. ## 操作顺序Order of Operations 控件应用数据按以下顺序操作：The control applies data operations in the following order: 1. 其中 （指定要返回的数据的记录）。Where (specify which data records to return). 2. Order By （排序）。Order By (sort). 3. Group By （共享的值的聚合数据记录）。Group By (aggregate data records that share values). 4. Order By （排序分组数据） 的组。Order Groups By (sort grouped data). 5. 选择 （指定哪些字段或属性返回）。Select (specify which fields or properties to return). 6. 自动排序 （按用户所选的属性排序数据记录）。Auto-sort (sort data records by a property that the user has selected). 7. 自动页 （检索用户已选择的数据记录的子集）。Auto-page (retrieve a subset of data records that were selected by the user). 您可以将条件添加到属性筛选从查询返回的数据记录。You can add conditions to the property to filter the data records that are returned from a query. 如果未设置属性，控件检索此数据对象中的每个记录。If the property is not set, the control retrieves every record from the data object. ## 对数据进行排序Ordering Data 您使用属性来指定从返回的数据要作为排序依据的属性的名称。You use the property to specify the names of properties from the returned data to sort by. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用控件，其[!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)]并且属性设置为`true`，必须提供中的值属性。When you use the control with [!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)] and the property is set to `true`, you must provide a value in the property. 默认情况下属性是`true`。By default, the property is `true`. 如果你将值赋给属性，您还必须包括所有标识列在查询中返回的属性列表中。If you assign a value to the property, you must also include all identity columns in the list of properties that is returned in the query. ## 数据分组Grouping Data 您使用属性来指定哪些属性用于合并具有相同的值的数据记录。You use the property to specify which properties are used to consolidate data records that have the same values. 当分组数据时，可以包括`Key`并`It`，它们动态创建中的属性，属性。When you group data, you can include `Key` and `It`, which are dynamically created properties, in the property. `Key`属性是指用来对数据进行分组的一个或多个属性中的值。The `Key` property refers to the values in the property or properties that were used to group the data. 例如，如果按属性名为分组`Category`，则`Key`属性将包含中的所有唯一值`Category`属性。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `Key` property will contain all unique values in the `Category` property. `It`属性是指一系列中的数据分组的单个记录。The `It` property refers to a collection of individual records in a grouping of data. 您可以循环访问`It`属性来检索已合并，在分组操作中的单个记录。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records that have been consolidated in the grouping operation. 例如，如果按属性名为分组`Category`，则`It`属性包含所有共享一个公共值中的单个记录`Category`属性。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `It` property contains all the individual records that share a common value in the `Category` property. 您使用属性来指定要使用的分组的数据进行排序的属性。You use the property to specify the properties to use for sorting the grouped data. 当分组数据，属性指定分组的数据中各记录的排序方式。When you group data, the property specifies how the individual records within the grouped data are sorted. 默认情况下，控件从一个数据对象中检索的所有属性的值。By default, the control retrieves values for all the properties from a data object. 您使用属性来指定要返回如果想要使用的子集可用属性的属性。You use the property to specify which properties to return if you want to work with a subset of available properties. 选择操作应用之后 Where、 Order By 和 Group By 操作。The Select operation is applied after the Where, Order By, and Group By operations. 因此，如果 Select 子句中创建了别名，别名不可用在其他子句中。Therefore, if you create an aliased name in a Select clause, the alias is not available in the other clauses. ## 数据修改Data Modifications 您可以指定是否使用启用数据修改， ，和属性。You can specify whether data modifications are enabled by using the , , and properties. 修改数据的用户界面控件通常提供通过数据绑定控件，如控件。The user interface for modifying data from a control is typically provided through a data-bound control, such as a control. 除了设置之外， ，或到`true`，启用自动数据修改所需满足以下条件：In addition to setting , , or to `true`, the following conditions are required to enable automatic data modifications: - 不能将属性分配一个值。The property cannot be assigned a value. - 不能将属性分配一个值。The property cannot be assigned a value. - 分配给的类属性必须派生自。The class that is assigned to the property must derive from . - 分配给属性属性必须派生自。The property that is assigned to the property must derive from . 你可以限制在两种方法中的数据绑定控件中显示的属性。You can restrict which properties are displayed in a data-bound control in two ways. 你可以设置属性的子集属性，或者你可以通过添加定义的字段的数据绑定控件控件。You can either set the property to a subset of properties, or you can define the fields for a data-bound control by adding controls. 但是，如果您设置属性，这意味着，不能启用自动更新、 插入和删除操作。However, if you set the property, it means that automatic update, insert, and delete operations cannot be enabled. 如果你想要使用的可用属性的子集时启用自动数据修改，未设置属性。If you want to enable automatic data modifications while you work with a subset of available properties, do not set the property. 相反，此数据对象中检索的所有属性和管理通过使用数据绑定控件所显示。Instead, retrieve all properties from the data object and manage which ones are displayed by using the data-bound control. 当你使用控件或控件，则还必须设置或属性设置为`false`。When you use the control or the control, you must also set the or properties to `false`. 这会阻止数据绑定控件自动包括用于编辑和删除数据的按钮。This prevents the data-bound control from automatically including buttons for editing and deleting the data. 不会显示在数据绑定控件的任何值存储在视图状态。Any values that are not displayed in the data-bound control are stored in view state. 它们不变时传递给数据源执行数据更新。They are passed unchanged to the data source when the data update is performed. ## 在运行时计算值Evaluating Values at Run Time 如果需要在运行时进行排序，评估值筛选，或者对值进行分组，您可以将参数添加到， ， ，或集合。If you have to evaluate values at run time for ordering, filtering, or grouping values, you can add parameters to the , , , or collections. 如果你想要指定默认值，您可以将参数添加到集合。If you want to specify default values, you can add parameters to the collection. 如果你想要检查或修改值，然后执行数据操作，则可以处理， ， ，或事件。If you want to examine or modify values before the data operation is executed, you can handle the , , , or events. 此外可以处理这些事件，以便取消数据操作或发生时根据用户输入的数据类中设置属性的验证错误。You can also handle these events in order to cancel the data operation or to examine validation errors that occurred when you set properties in the data class based on user input. 若要完成数据操作后，请检查值，处理， ， ，或事件。To examine values after the data operation has finished, handle the , , , or events. ## 使用存储过程Working with Stored Procedures 您使用要从存储过程检索数据，通过创建的事件处理程序控件事件。You use the control to retrieve data from a stored procedure by creating an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序，您在数据上下文类表示存储的过程中调用该方法并将结果设置为属性的对象。In the event handler, you call the method in the data context class that represents the stored procedure and set the result to the property of the object. 如果想要启用自动更新、 插入和删除操作的数据，从方法返回的类型必须匹配在指定的类型属性。If you want to enable automatic update, insert, and delete operations for the data, the type that is returned from the method must match the type that is specified in the property. 有关创建数据上下文方法的详细信息，请参阅[如何：创建映射到存储过程和函数的 DataContext 方法（O/R 设计器）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7ca32f1-50b3-48af-ad92-ceafd749296a)。For more information about creating data context methods, see [How to: Create DataContext methods mapped to stored procedures and functions (O/R Designer)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7ca32f1-50b3-48af-ad92-ceafd749296a). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用属性来指定哪些属性用于合并具有相同的值的数据记录。You use the property to specify which properties are used for consolidating data records that have the same values. 例如，如果您设置属性设置为`Name`，在查询中所有具有相同的记录`Name`作为单个合并记录返回属性值。For example, if you set the property to `Name`, all the records in the query that have the same `Name` property value are returned as a single consolidated record. 可以将分配到多个属性属性中的所有属性通过`new`函数，并使用逗号分隔每个属性。You can assign more than one property to the property by enclosing all the properties in the `new` function and separating each property by using a comma. 例如，若要按属性分组`Name`，然后`Category`，请设置属性设置为`new(Name, Category)`。For example, to group by the properties `Name` and then `Category`, set the property to `new(Name, Category)`. 用于分组的值的属性中返回生成的属性名为通过`Key`。The values in the property that are used for grouping are returned through a generated property named `Key`. 您包括`Key`中的属性属性来检索已分组的值。You include the `Key` property in the property to retrieve the grouped values. 可以设置`Key`属性设置为使用别名`As`关键字，但您不需要使用别名。You can set the `Key` property to an alias by using the `As` keyword, but you are not required to use an alias. 例如，你可能会设置属性设置为一个名为属性`Category`。For example, you might set the property to a property named `Category`. 可以检索中的合并的值`Category`通过设置属性属性设置为`new(Key As ProductCategory)`。You can retrieve the consolidated values from the `Category` property by setting the property to `new(Key As ProductCategory)`. 可以通过包括访问分组中的单个记录`It`中的属性属性。You can access the individual records in a grouping by including the `It` property in the property. `It`属性包含的记录共享中的分组属性的值的集合。The `It` property contains a collection of records that share a value in the grouped property. 您可以循环访问`It`属性来检索单个记录。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records. 属性通常用于聚合方法。The property is often used with aggregation methods. 可以使用以下聚合方法：You can use the following aggregate methods: - remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当更新和删除操作已启用控制存储在视图状态中的所有记录的原始值。By default, when update and delete operations have been enabled, the control stores the original values for all the records in view state. 控件将存储的所有主键的值，并且所有属性未都标有`UpdateCheck.Never`中`Column`属性。The control stores values for all primary keys and all properties not marked with `UpdateCheck.Never` in the `Column` attribute. 您设置`UpdateCheck`的属性`Column`属性中[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]。You set the `UpdateCheck` property of the `Column` attribute in the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]. LINQ to SQL 更新或删除数据之前，它会检查针对数据源中的当前值在视图状态的值。Before LINQ to SQL updates or deletes data, it checks the values in view state against the current values in the data source. 如果值不匹配，数据源记录已更改。If the values do not match, the data source record has changed. 在这种情况下，LINQ to SQL 将引发异常并且不会不继续更新或删除操作。In that case, LINQ to SQL throws an exception and does not continue with the update or delete operation. 有关 LINQ to SQL 的详细信息，请参阅[LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). 状态视图中存储的原始值可能会导致的页大小变得不必要的大型和可以公开恶意用户的敏感数据。Storing the original values in view state can cause the page size to become unnecessarily large and can expose sensitive data to a malicious user. 您可以禁用通过设置存储视图状态中的值属性设置为`false`。You can disable storing values in view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果执行此操作，则必须提供您自己的方式来确保数据未更改。If you do this, you must provide your own way to make sure that the data has not changed. 如果您设置属性设置为`false`，原始值不会保留在数据绑定控件的视图状态。If you set the property to `false`, the original values are not persisted in view state for the data-bound control. 在这种情况下，LINQ to SQL 无法验证数据的完整性。In that case, LINQ to SQL cannot verify the integrity of the data. LINQ to SQL 将引发异常，指示数据冲突，即使不实际更改数据源中的数据。LINQ to SQL will throw an exception that indicates a data conflict even if the data in the data source has not actually changed. 如果基础数据源包含自动更新在更新过程的时间戳字段，您可以仅将该值存储在视图状态中。If the underlying data source contains a timestamp field that is automatically updated during an update, you can store only that value in view state. 在这种情况下，实体类中的时间戳属性设置为`IsVersion=true`和所有属性都设置为`UpdateCheck.Never`。In that case, the timestamp property in the entity class is set to `IsVersion=true` and all the properties are set to `UpdateCheck.Never`. 因为在每次该记录中的数据更改时，数据库会自动更新时间戳字段，LINQ to SQL 确定从该值中，如果数据已更改。Because a timestamp field is automatically updated by the database every time that data in that record changes, LINQ to SQL determines from that value if data has changed. 这有助于减少的视图状态大小，未公开任何敏感数据。This helps reduce the size of view state, and no sensitive data is exposed. LINQ to SQL 数据库中时间戳值的状态将通过比较时间戳值在视图中检查的数据一致性。LINQ to SQL will check for data consistency by comparing the timestamp value in view state with the timestamp value in the database. 有关详细信息，请参见[演练：使用时间戳与 LinqDataSource 控件，以检查数据完整性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Using a Timestamp with the LinqDataSource Control to Check Data Integrity](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa).
